At the beginning of your upkeep, you may cloak a card from your hand. [i](To cloak a card, put it onto the battlefield face down as a 2/2 creature with ward {2}. Turn it face up any time for its mana cost if it's a creature card.)[/i]
Whenever a permanent you control is turned face up, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.
